head.title: AFFILIATED COMPUTER SERVICES TO ACQUIRE GENIX GROUP

hedline.hl1: AFFILIATED COMPUTER SERVICES TO ACQUIRE GENIX GROUP

block.p: Affiliated Computer Services Inc., which provides information technology services, signed a definitive agreement yesterday to acquire Genix Group, a unit of the MCN Corporation, for $135 million in cash. The merger would create the nation's fourth-largest outside provider of data-processing services, with annual revenues of more than $500 million, Affiliated said. Genix mainly serves the manufacturing, insurance and utility industries, complementing Dallas-based Affiliated's strengths in the health care, financial services, transportation and telecommunications segments. Genix, based in Dearborn, Mich., had revenues of $105.2 million in 1995.
